HomePage.resume: Passionate and driven Mobile Developer with a strong foundation in modern mobile technologies. Proficient in Flutter and well-versed in building cross-platform applications with clean architecture and responsive UI. A collaborative team player committed to delivering efficient, scalable, and user-friendly mobile solutions.

services.title: Service
services.sub_title: I work as a freelancer to develop exceptional mobile applications for brands, companies, institutions, and startups, focusing on strategic web solutions.

cta.title: Let's work together!
cta.sub_title: I'm open for freelance projects, feel free to email me to see how can we collaborate.

resume.paragraf_1: Hello there! Thank you for visiting my personal website. I'm Feri, a mobile developer with a strong focus on Flutter. I specialize in building high-performance, cross-platform mobile applications using Flutter, a framework that allows me to deliver seamless experiences on both Android and iOS
resume.paragraf_2: IWith a solid foundation in Dart and a deep understanding of Flutter's rich set of tools and libraries, I am dedicated to creating beautiful and functional mobile apps. I am passionate about building apps that are not only efficient but also easy to use and visually appealing.
resume.paragraf_3: I strongly believe that effective communication is crucial for success in any role. I am adaptable, think efficiently, and always strive for the best. My experiences have equipped me with analytical skills and strong leadership abilities. I am comfortable working collaboratively in a team and am excited about the opportunity to contribute to team success. Looking forward to the possibility of collaboration!
